title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 369: Featuring Keith Ballard
description:
On Episode 369 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Keith Ballard. Keith joined us (1:09:35) during our Minnesota Trip to discuss his career, growing up in Minnesota, the infamous incident with Tomas Vokoun & tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing all the recent NHL news, including the NHL all-star rosters, Kodak Black at the Panthers game, and once again the Edmonton Oilers struggling. The guys wrap up the show discussing whether or not Nick Lidstrom can still play in the NHL, the NFL, and some movie talk.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
